timeline.message:
GH-2555 Upgraded apache commons dependencies

Signed-off-by: Bart Hanssens <bart.hanssens@bosa.fgov.be>

timeline.bodyText: i don't object, exactly, but why create properties for these if they're only referenced once, in the same file?
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText:
Hmm yeah, I went a little overboard here...
Personally, I find it a tiny bit easier to spot the versions (instead of finding "version")...
Though the downside is that the IDE cannot be used anymore to check for newer versions using delete-and-autocomplete-again... so I'll just revert this... less lines = less bugs
replies.author: barthanssens
